message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Alice,  $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you the product for $105.
Alice,  $105 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.  Let's try to find a middle ground.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $100, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer on the product.
